author: entertainment.ie
title: Travel | Hotel Deal of the Week: Celtic Ross Hotel
text:
Celtic Ross Hotel, Rosscarbery, Co. Cork
€215pps – 3 nights Bed & Breakfast with Dinner on one evening in the Kingfisher Bar & Bistro. Includes use of the leisure centre with indoor pool and fully equipped gym. Serenity Rooms with a full range of treatments; regular live music in the Kingfisher Bar; sports on a HD 8 ft screen; and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.
This is a midweek and weekend offer, valid to November 29, 2015.
www.celticrosshotel.com
